mapper.insert: insert into coursecommon(contentid,region, firstimage, firstimage2, overview, title, mapx, mapy,mlevel) values( #{contentid},#{region}, #{firstimage}, #{firstimage2}, #{overview}, #{title}, #{mapx}, #{mapy},#{mlevel})
update coursecommon set distance = #{distance}, taketime =#{taketime} where contentid = #{contentid}
insert into coursedetail( contentid, region,subdetailalt, subdetailimg, subdetailoverview, subname) values( #{contentid},#{region},#{subdetailalt}, #{subdetailimg}, #{subdetailoverview}, #{subname})

insert into mycoursecommon(userid, mycoursecommontitle, mycoursemainimage, mycourseinfo,totaldistance ,totaltime ,mycoursecommonisdelete , mycourseregion) values(#{userid},#{mycoursecommontitle},#{mycoursemainimage},#{mycourseinfo},#{totaldistance},#{totaltime},#{mycoursecommonisdelete},#{mycourseregion})

insert into mycoursedetail( mycoursecommonid,userid, mycoursedetailname, mycoursedetailimage,mycoursedetailoverview ,mycoursedetailadd,mycoursedetailisdelete,mycourseregion) values( #{mycoursecommonid},#{userid},#{mycoursedetailname}, #{mycoursedetailimage}, #{mycoursedetailoverview}, #{mycoursedetailadd}, #{mycoursedetailisdelete}, #{mycourseregion})
mapper.select: select contentid,region,subname, subdetailimg, subdetailoverview from coursedetail where region=#{region};

select mycoursecommonid,userid,mycoursecommontitle, mycoursemainimage, mycourseinfo,totaldistance ,totaltime ,mycoursecommonisdelete , mycourseregion from mycoursecommon where mycoursecommonisdelete = 0 and mycourseregion = #{mycourseregion};

select mycoursedetailid,mycoursecommonid,userid, mycoursedetailname, mycoursedetailimage,mycoursedetailoverview ,mycoursedetailadd,mycoursedetailisdelete,mycourseregion from mycoursedetail where mycoursedetailisdelete = 0 and mycourseregion = #{mycourseregion};
select contentid,themecode,region,firstimage,firstimage2,overview,title,mapx,mapy,distance, taketime, mlevel from coursecommon where contentid=#{contentid};
select contentid,region,subdetailalt, subname, subdetailimg, subdetailoverview from coursedetail where contentid=#{contentid};

select mycoursecommonid,userid,mycoursecommontitle, mycoursemainimage, mycourseinfo,totaldistance ,totaltime ,mycoursecommonisdelete from mycoursecommon where mycoursecommonisdelete = 0 and mycoursecommonid=#{mycoursecommonid};

select mycoursedetailid,mycoursecommonid,userid, mycoursedetailname, mycoursedetailimage,mycoursedetailoverview ,mycoursedetailadd,mycoursedetailisdelete from mycoursedetail where mycoursedetailisdelete = 0 and mycoursecommonid=#{mycoursecommonid};
select themepostid,themecode,userid, themecommentcontent, themecommentdate from themecomment where themecode=#{themecode} and themepostid=#{themepostid};
